title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.2 - Lighting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.2 - Lighting

State Regulations

The director shall ensure that all areas of each facility
are illuminated in a manner consistent with all applicable laws, codes, rules
and regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7354.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
